title: A new start of a new decade!
text: This year or this decades starts with an art challenge for me. I have joined in the Sktchy Challenge 30 faces 30 days, where I am joining an International community of over 800 artists all over the world. We make a portrait every single day---of the same muse. We get the muse in our inbox, and we all share what we have made using #30faces30daysThe above is the portait I made today.I think it is important to keep oneself challenged creatively. Only then does one grow.You can see the process of how I painted the above on my Instagram stories. They remain for 24 hours.Wishing you all a wonderful new year! This is post 17 of my 30 day blog marathon. Rather than mention it in the title, this year I thought I would put it in the body of the post :)Come back tomorrow for a new post! :)
